topic.title: Changing the Style of WebHelp Mobile Pages

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Classic systemChanging the style of WebHelp Mobile pages

body.p: You can change the style for your WebHelp Mobile pages by setting a custom theme created with a third-party tool.

To create a custom theme for WebHelp Mobile pages, use the following procedure:
Create a custom theme (the result will be a CSS stylesheet). Use a designer tool, such as the ThemeRoller for jQuery Mobile, to create your own custom theme and then download the resulting CSS stylesheet.If you are using ThemeRoller for jQuery Mobile, make sure you use a type C swatch.
Make sure that the output folder is empty.
Run the transformation scenario.
